Preview Page (Zip File Properties Dialog Box)

Requires: Application Builder or Professional System

Use this page of the Zip File Properties dialog box to see a preview of the zip file build.

This page includes the following components:

  • Generate Preview—Creates a preview of the zip file that displays in File preview, Base zip directory, and Zip preview.
    Note  Including outputs of other build specifications in the zip file can slow down preview generation.
  • File preview—Displays a preview of the path to the zip file.
  • Base zip directory—Displays the base directory relative to which the files in the zip file are saved.
  • Zip preview—Displays a preview of the directory structure of the zip file.
